Key Match Events: Bellingham scored for England in the 87th minute
Pavlidis scored for Greece in the 49th and 90+4 minutes
Koulierakis received a yellow card in the 6th minute
Kourbelis received a yellow card in the 71st minute
Pavlidis received a yellow card in the 90+1 minute
Pelkas received a yellow card in the 90+2 minute
Pre-Game Insights: England aiming to make it three wins under Lee Carsley
Greece leads the group with a superior goal difference
Lee Carsley could become the first England manager to win his first three games without conceding
Greece has won more Nations League games than any other country since the tournament's inception
Greece's Fotis Ioannidis is injured and will not play
Miscellaneous Highlights: Harry Kane celebrated his 100th England appearance
David Beckham's 2001 free kick is a standout moment in previous meetings between England and Greece
